product_name: Moxie Cycling Layered Tank Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Look and feel your best as you ride in the women's Moxie Cycling Layered Tank Bike Jersey, and also when you reach your destination. This tank is loose fitting and has a built-in bra. Polyester/spandex fabric wicks away sweat and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Built-in nylon/spandex bra offers light support. Backpax(TM) pocketing in back features 3 standard cycling pockets and a large, hidden zippered pouch big enough for a jacket. Moxie Cycling Layered Tank Bike Jersey features a loose fit for flattering coverage.
short_description: Look and feel your best as you ride in the women's Moxie Cycling Layered Tank Bike Jersey, and also when you reach your destination. This tank is loose fitting and has a built-in bra.
